Shifting Wilds Strike.name: Shifting Wilds Strike
Shifting Wilds Strike.flavor: Like a predator in the wild, you shift to a better position after your attack.
Shifting Wilds Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you shift 3 squares.
Shifting Wilds Strike.special: If you use this power while you are raging, roll a d20. On a 10 or higher, you retain the use of this power.

Press the Kill.name: Press the Kill
Press the Kill.flavor: As one foe drops, you turn with lightning speed and prepare to attack your next target.
Press the Kill.trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points
Press the Kill.effect: You shift a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier.

Wildrunner's Rage.name: Wildrunner's Rage
Wildrunner's Rage.flavor: You dart among your enemies, hampering their movement with each well-placed attack.
Wildrunner's Rage.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the primary target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Wildrunner's Rage.effect: You shift a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier and then make a secondary attack.
Wildrunner's Rage.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Wildrunner's Rage.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the secondary target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Wildrunner's Rage.secondaryeffect: You enter the wildrunnerâ€™s rage. Until the rage ends, you gain a +2 bonus to AC and Reflex, and you ignore difficult terrain. In addition, you can shift 2 squares as a move action.
